import React from "react"; const AboutUsPage = () => { return (

About Us

We’re focused on delivering a smooth, reliable, and enjoyable online shopping experience.

Welcome to our e-commerce platform! We offer a curated range of products at competitive prices, with quality and customer satisfaction at the core.

Our team carefully selects products that match real customer needs — from everyday essentials to trending items — ensuring value in every purchase.

Thank you for choosing us. We look forward to making your shopping experience simple, secure, and enjoyable.

); }; export default AboutUsPage;
